# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files

file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/bug_297.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bug_297.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/modelcard.mod ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/modelcard.mod ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/tags ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/tags ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/bug_297.cir.sh ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bug_297.cir.sh ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bug_297.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/options ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/options ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
add_test(NAME Certification_Tests/BUG_297_SON/bug_297.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} bug_297.cir.sh $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} bug_297.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_297_SON/bug_297.cir.prn )
set_property(TEST Certification_Tests/BUG_297_SON/bug_297.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;parallel;errorexit")
set_tests_properties(Certification_Tests/BUG_297_SON/bug_297.cir.sh PROPERTIES TIMEOUT 30)
